goals.description: Create advanced RESTful API framework with GraphQL support
goals.success_criteria: Comprehensive API framework with REST endpoints, GraphQL schema, authentication, rate limiting, and comprehensive documentation

goals.description: Implement microservices architecture with service discovery and communication
goals.success_criteria: Microservices framework with service discovery, inter-service communication, load balancing, and fault tolerance

goals.description: Build API gateway and service mesh for unified API management
goals.success_criteria: Centralized API gateway with routing, authentication, monitoring, and service mesh capabilities
